pages.title: Steam Generator
pages.text: The Steam Generator is a creative only part that act as a constant source of steam for a Turbine.$(br2)This part automatically supply as much steam as the maximum amount permitted by the part variant to the Vapor Fluid Tank, but only when the Turbine is active.

$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no$(br)$(l)Creative mode:$() this part is only available in creative mode and there is no crafting recipe for it.
